ygData.subject: Re: Server question
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, as I said before I haven t yet played in commercial. Now that I am settled with moving and all and getting EQ ready, can anyone (especially those that
ygData.messageBody:
Well, as I said before I haven't yet played in commercial. Now that I am
settled with moving and all and getting EQ ready, can anyone (especially
those that have played on more than one server) give me any suggestions as
to what the best servers are to play on?

The group that I was always with in P4 is on Veeshan, and they are right
about to hit 50th level (all of them!)...and, well - they are pure
powergamers. I was wanting to join them, but there is no way I could keep up
with them. Actually, I'm thinking of taking it easy. I did all the
powergaming I need during beta. I would like to seriously get into the RP
aspect of the game (or help to foster it).

I was on Fennin Ro at that time, and that server was a nightmare. I guess
it's ok now? I heard that during beginning of commercial Fennin was even
more crowded than before. Any info on this will be much appreciated!
Especially if there are any particular servers I should stay away from. I am
thinking getting on the newest server would be ideal, though I don't know
which one is newest. Cazic?

Thanks in advance everyone! =)

Sartori of Kelethin
